about_the_game:
The stakes are high, and the danger is real in this thrilling cyberpunk adventure. Follow Lila's journey as she delves deeper into the shadows of Neo-Tokyo, utilizing her skills as a hacker to unravel the mysteries surrounding her job. But as she uncovers the truth, Lila realizes that she may have gotten in too deep, and the consequences of her actions could be catastrophic. With advanced technology, shadowy figures, and unexpected twists at every turn, this story will keep you on the edge of your seat until the very end.

Featuring full audio narration, you'll feel like you're part of the story with every word. Autoplay mode offers an audio book experience that immerses you in the story, while normal play allows for a more casual visual novel experience.

Featuring full audio narration, you'll feel like you're part of the story with every word. Autoplay mode offers an audio book experience that immerses you in the story, while normal play allows for a more casual visual novel experience.
name: Lila's Synthetic Shadows

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10/11
  • Processor: Dual Core 3ghz +
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 2 gb
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 11
  • Processor: Dual Core 3ghz +
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 2 gb
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
